WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is fixed in release-0.8.3 and develop by commit 32e63091154203abe01a3be597bab1a1fe0b6926.
WorkItem.Description:
If you pass both `--out dirname` and `--exec` to `tsc`, then the program doesn't run.

Steps to reproduce:

    $ cat foo.ts
    console.log("hello, world");
    $ tsc --exec foo.ts
    hello, world
    $ rm foo.js
    $ tsc --out subdir --exec foo.ts
                 # expected output here, but got none
    $
